page.title: 08Games children play.
page.content: In Stoke Hammond children play different games.Some are{Three Bad {Eggs,Polo,Bulldog}and others.{Polo}is played with as many people as you want in the group.One person is it and that person calls out a subject.If it was trees then the other people would each choose a tree.Somebody would call them out and the person who is it would pick one.That person and the one who is it both run to the opposite side and back.As they reach the end they shout Polo and whoever gets there first would be it for the next game. Another game is{Bulldog.}There is a group of people at one end of the hall and one person in the middle.That person would call someones name.That person would run to the other end and try not to be caught.Then when that person reaches the end they shout Bulldog and the others run as well.
